ygData.msgSnippet: * Iron Raptor sighed as she felt her feet touch the ground but then cringed when she suddenly saw Prowl hit the side of the base, hearing the ugly snap of one

Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
From: Iron Raptor <ironraptor13@...>



* Iron Raptor sighed as she felt her feet touch the ground but then cringed when she suddenly saw Prowl hit the side of the base, hearing the ugly snap of one of his wings.
She knew that he could look after himself but she was still a bit concerned, that snap was something that she would have been better off not hearing!
Iron Raptor never took her eyes off of him just in case he would have been to injured to stand, but when he got up and transformed into his robot mode she was a bit more relaxed.
But she was surprised when he walked up to her and asked if she was alright, concern clearly written in his optics. It was HE who slammed into the side of the base, not her! And he was asking HER if she was alright? A bit monotonous if she thought so herself.
She looked away from Prowl and towards the base, a meeting scheduled that they had to attend.
Iron Raptor shook her head while still looking at the Ark, she then transformed into her robot mode as well. Her cheek healed but her back still feeling a bit raw even though it would appear repaired to the naked optic, it had been a fairly slow recovery.
She then looked back at Prowl.*

" I'm fine."

* But then she saw that his wing was a bit out of line with it's structure, a simple meaning that something was wrong with it. She walked over to him and reached behind, with a gentle but firm hand she snapped the wing back into it's proper shape.
It was strange that he would slam into the base like that, or at least come to such an abrupt stop. Perhaps it was her weight that had thrown him off? But at least he had gotten the both of them there without any attacks or such events as that.
But she then smiled as she stroked her hand over the, once damaged, spot to make sure that it was well.*

" But thanks for the ride."
